panels.description: How many bytes are read from and written to the ingestion channel (e.g. Kafka) per seconds
panels.title: IO Bytes Throughput [Projection Storer only]

panels.description: Shows the service CPU actual usage and the deploy request/limit
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Shows the service RAM actual consumption and the deploy request/limit
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: How many ingestion events are read from and written to the ingestion channel (e.g. Kafka) per seconds - This value is computed directly on the service
panels.title: IO Messages Throughput [Projection Storer only]

panels.description: Shows the number of service service replicas deployed
panels.title: Available Service Replicas

panels.description: How many ingestion events are read from and written to the ingestion channel (e.g. Kafka) per seconds - This uses a message counter onto which is applied the rate function to obtain the throughput
panels.title: Messages Consumption Rate

panels.description: Display for each ingestion topic the number of messages that have still to be consumed by the service
panels.title: Consumer Lag Per Topic

panels.description: Distribution of the time employed to process all the topic-partitions received within within a batch of ingestion messages. Note: commit phase not included

panels.title: Batch Processing Time Statistics

panels.description: Distribution of the time employed to take the raw ingestion messages and transform into projection events (cast + project operations)
panels.title: Projection Records Preparation Processing Time [s]

panels.title: Projection Records Preparation Time Statistics

panels.description: Distribution of the time employed to process a single topic-partition within a batch of ingestion messages
panels.title: Batch Partition Processing Time [s]

panels.title: Batch Partition Processing Time Statistics

panels.description: Distribution of the time employed to store projection records onto the configured storage system

panels.description: Distribution of the time employed to send the pr-update events onto the outgoing channel
